formal_name:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil
Survivor Overclocked Patch
description:
Applying the update will address the following issues:

- The game will no longer freeze when summoning a demon during battle - The infrequent hang encountered during Auction House ‘Accidents’ has been removed - Text display errors have been corrected

Once the update has been downloaded it will be installed automatically. If the update has been successful “ver 1.1” will be displayed on the title screen after launching the game.

We apologise for any inconvenience these issues may have caused and recommend downloading this update to make for an improved gaming experience.
name:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil
Survivor Overclocked Patch
